Pre-Game Insights: India, with two impressive wins in two games, are high on momentum and confidence.
India is determined to secure their place in the semi-finals by topping Group 1.
India has a significant 19-11 lead over Australia in their T20I rivalry.
This match presents an opportunity for India to avenge their heartbreak from the 2023 ODI World Cup final.
Australia boasts a winning mentality in ICC white-ball tournaments.
Despite a surprise defeat to Afghanistan, Australia has a marginal advantage in AUSvIND matchups in ICC white-ball competitions (12-10).
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will take place on Monday, June 24, 2024, at 8 pm IST at Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium, Gros Islet, St Lucia.
A sold-out Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium is expected.
Key players to watch include Jasprit Bumrah and Rohit Sharma for India, and Pat Cummins for Australia.
